quote: Rita has spent her whole life being chased by boys. Because of that, she never had a chance to stop running long enough to figure out who she was and what kind of guy she should let catch her.
quote_letters: RITA HAS SPENT HER WHOLE LIFE BEING CHASED BY BOYS BECAUSE OF THAT SHE NEVER HAD A CHANCE TO STOP RUNNING LONG ENOUGH TO FIGURE OUT WHO SHE WAS AND WHAT KIND OF GUY SHE SHOULD LET CATCH HER
